flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Salazar had 7 x 12 = <<7*12=84>>84 oranges.
He reserved 84 x 1/4 = <<84*1/4=12>>12 oranges for his friend.
Ha had 84 - 12 = <<84-12=72>>72 oranges to be sold yesterday.
But only 72 x 3/7 = <<72*3/7=216/7>>216/7 oranges were sold yesterday.
So, he had 72 - 216/7 = <<72-216/7=288/7>>288/7 oranges left.
Since four oranges are rotten, then only 288/7 - 4 = <<288/7-4=260/7>>260/7 oranges are left to be sold today.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
